meanings.sent1: After playing outside, I rinse my hands in the sink.
meanings.sent2: I always rinse my fruits and vegetables before eating them.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to rinse its paws in the puddle outside.
meanings.sent4: She rinsed away her worries in the calming stream.
meanings.sent5: The rain rinsed the dusty streets, leaving them fresh and clean.

meanings.definition: The act of cleaning with water only.
meanings.sent1: I gave the dishes a quick rinse before putting them in the dishwasher.
meanings.sent2: A thorough rinse is essential to remove all the soap from your hair.
meanings.sent3: The car wash included a free rinse at the end, making the vehicle sparkle.
meanings.sent4: The rinse of the ocean waves against the shore was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The rinse of the waterfall created a beautiful mist in the air.
